section.p: If you have issues with the Java Web Start snapshot, remove your .xpontus folder and download the plugins.zip file again.

The Java Web Start snapshot is updated on a regular basis. So if you see that the application is trying to update, please redownload and install the plugins.zip file as mentionned in the snapshot download page(above).
A first draft of the DEVELOPER GUIDE is on the way.

section.name: Overview
section.p: XPontus XML Editor is a simple XML Editor with lots of features. It aims to become "the" free alternative to commercial XML IDES such as XMLSPy or Oxygen XML Editor, or Exchanger XML Editor without the "Entreprise features" for now.

section.name: Features
section.p: XPontus tries to provide you the features you would expect of a real XML IDE in a familiar and conviviable manner.
Have a look at the features page for more details.

ul.li: Become a full featured XML Editor.
Integrate easily in popular IDES such as Eclipse and Netbeans
Integrate easily into other applications requiring XML needs
